name: Advanced Topics in Diaspora and Transnationalism
description: An in-depth investigation of topics in Diaspora and Transnationalism. Content in any given year depends on instructor. Refer to the Centre for Diaspora and Transnational Studies website (http://cdts.utoronto.ca/index.php/undergraduate/courses/) for more information.
prerequisites: DTS200Y1 or equivalent, or CJS200H1 or CJS201H1 and a minimum of 15 FCEs
